sentences.en: A driver was killed in a freak accident when a cow fell from a bridge.
sentences.cn: 一名司机在一起由一头奶牛掉下桥而引起的怪异事故中丧生了.

sentences.en: A freak wave had buckled the deck.
sentences.cn: 突然掀起的巨浪打弯了甲板。

sentences.en: A lamb with 2 tails is a freak of nature.
sentences.cn: 有两条尾巴的小羊是畸形的.

sentences.en: By some freak of fate, she won an enormous sum of money.
sentences.cn: 她不知交了什么好运, 赢了一大笔钱.

sentences.en: By some strange freak, snow fell in Egypt a few years ago.
sentences.cn: 真是怪事, 几年前埃及下了一场雪.

sentences.en: For the real speed freak, there is a 2 - litre, fuel - injection version of the car.
sentences.cn: 对于那些玩命追求极速的车迷, 有种2升 、 燃料喷射的车型.

sentences.en: He is a bluffer , and a screwball, a kind of freak.
sentences.cn: 他是个吹牛家,是个怪物, 是个畸形人.

sentences.en: However, outside of these institutions the black thinking woman is looked upon as a freak.
sentences.cn: 然而，在这些机构之外，有思想的黑人女性被当作怪胎看待。

sentences.en: I was born with black hair all over my back, like some sort of freak.
sentences.cn: 我出生时满背黑毛, 就像个怪物.

sentences.en: It was a freak of mine to wear pink pajamas.
sentences.cn: 穿上粉红色睡衣是我一时的奇想.

sentences.en: Supposing by a freak the Tudsburys did show up in Honolulu?
sentences.cn: 没准儿突然之间塔茨伯利父女俩真的在檀香山出现了 呢 ?

sentences.en: The crops were badly knocked about by that freak storm.
sentences.cn: 庄稼受到了那次反常风暴的严重摧毁.

sentences.en: The ferry was hit by a freak wave off the North Wales coast.
sentences.cn: 渡船在北威尔士海岸附近被一股反常的海浪击中。

sentences.en: These glasses make me look like a freak.
sentences.cn: 我戴这副眼镜看上去像个怪人。

sentences.en: Weir broke his leg in a freak accident playing golf.
sentences.cn: 韦尔因为一次打高尔夫时发生的离奇事故折断了腿。

sentences.en: Women who studied engineering used to be considered freaks.
sentences.cn: 学工程的女性过去常被视为怪物。

words.tran_cn: 畸形的；奇特的；朝三暮四的；异想天开的
畸形的；捉摸不定的（等于freakish）
怪人，怪事；畸形人；反复无常

phrases.tran_cn: 喜欢控制一切的人；对控制上瘾者
特殊事件；不寻常的事故
使处于极度兴奋中；崩溃

trans.tran_cn: 反常的事，突然的念头，怪异物，[俚]吸毒（成瘾）者；颓废派成员；性变态者
trans.tran_en: someone who is considered to be very strange because of the way they look, behave, or think

trans.tran_cn: 胡闹，开玩笑，行事任性怪诞，[美国俚语]（尤指在服用迷幻药后）变得极度兴奋，[俚语]（像吸过毒似的）行为反常
激怒，[俚语]使采取不合常规的生活方式，[俚语]使处于幻觉剂影响之下
